alert.note: Alert for Clay; Cloud; Marshall; Nemaha; Ottawa; Republic; Riley; Washington (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued October 12 at 2:33PM CDT until October 12 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Topeka
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 008, 009, 010, 011, 020, 021, 022, AND 034... ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 7 PM CDT THURSDAY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 008, 009, 010, 011, 020, 021, 022, AND 034... The National Weather Service in Topeka has issued a Red Flag Warning, which is in effect from noon to 7 PM CDT Thursday. The Fire Weather Watch is no longer in effect. * TIMING... Until 7 PM today and from noon to 7 PM Thursday. * WINDS...Northwest 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 35 mph today. Thursday, northwest 20 to 25 mph with gusts up to 40 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...20 to 25 percent this afternoon, and 15 to 20 percent Thursday. * TEMPERATURES...In the middle 70s today, and the upper 60s Thursday.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Clay; Cloud; Marshall; Nemaha; Ottawa; Republic; Riley; Washington
